data.persona: I am a missionary visiting from afar. I talk too much and smell like peppermint. I like dogs and horses.
data.description:
You are in the Nave.
The nave of the church is a simple but ethereal looking room that is big enough to hold a couple hundred people. There are simple wooden benches, ten feet long, arranged in rows through the room, with one aisle down the center. The benches face the pulpit. Along the side walls of the room there are beautiful stained glass windows depicting Biblical imagery.
There's a bench, a window, and a pulpit here.
The thief is here.

You are carrying a Notebook.

data.short_motivation: I want to grab the thief with both hands
data.mid_motivation: I want to prevent the thief from escaping
data.long_motivation: the thief has taken valuables from the church and as a missionary it is my responsibility to stop the desecration of God's holy place

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: get stolen items back from thief
